subject: World Baseball Classic
Baseball
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: Teams can almost stomach when players are hurt on their watch. But if players are injured elsewhere, such as in the World Baseball Classic, teams cringe and wonder if the pain was avoidable.
snippet: Teams can almost stomach when players are hurt on their watch. But if players are injured elsewhere, such as in the World Baseball Classic, teams cringe and wonder if the pain was avoidable.
